name: Cash Flow
subtitle: PERSONAL BUDGET ASSISTANT
description: Cash Flow is a mobile application designed to help users manage their finances by tracking income, expenses, and budgets. The app provides an intuitive and convenient way to log transactions, monitor account balances, and set spending limits directly from your mobile device.

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Secure local user authentication with hashed and salted passwords.

features.title: Account Management
features.description: Add and manage multiple accounts, with balance, income, and expense tracking.

features.title: Transaction Tracking
features.description: Log income and expenses with ease, view transaction history, and monitor balance changes over time with a dynamic graph.

features.title: Budget Management
features.description: Set spending limits for categories, visualize spending distribution with a pie chart, and receive alerts when budget limits are reached or exceeded.

features.title: Data Visualization
features.description: Balance and category spending charts to help users understand their financial habits.
